eligibilityCritera.description: The applicant must be 18 years of age or older as of the date of application.
eligibilityCritera.title: Minimum Age Requirement

checkConditions.description: Applicant must be at least 18 years old. Check the Date of Birth on provided document against application date.
checkConditions.title: Minimum Age Check

eligibilityCritera.description: The applicant's annual family income must be less than or equal to ₹6,00,000.
eligibilityCritera.title: Income Limit

checkConditions.description: Check if the applicant's annual family income is less than or equal to ₹6,00,000. Refer to the provided pay slips or tax records for income verification.
checkConditions.title: Income Limit

eligibilityCritera.description: The applicant should make a declaration they do not own an house in the same neighbourhood.
eligibilityCritera.title: Home Ownership

checkConditions.description: Applicant must declare that they do not own a house in the same neighbourhood.
checkConditions.title: Home Ownership Declaration
